original_text: Nor yet that he should offer himself often, as the high priest entereth into the holy place every year with blood of others;
korean_text: 대제사장이 해마다 다른 것의 피로써 성소에 들어가는 것 같이 자주 자기를 드리려고 아니하실지니

sentences.original_text: Nor yet that he should offer himself often
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그가 자주 자신을 드려서는 안 되며

sentences.original_text: as the high priest entereth into the holy place every year
